items.sentence: Tom took his finger off the trigger and lowered the gun.
When did you find out that Tom was the one who did that?
You ought to let Tom know that Mary is going to do that.
I want you to know I appreciate all you\'ve done for us.
People who live in glass houses shouldn\'t throw stones.
Tom didn\'t want to look, but he couldn\'t help himself.
Tom doesn\'t have to do anything he doesn\'t want to do.
Tom was nervous, but he knew what he was supposed to do.
Some people felt that Tom\'s behavior was inappropriate.
Tell Tom I\'m going to drop by his house this afternoon.
